page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
page.content: We would like to thank all those who contributed to this Domesday Project in our block especially the members of Lower Sixth History class 1985: Deirdre Barden, Deborah Bradley, Jacqueline Conlon, Mary Cowan, Maedbh Cranney, Maeve Cunningham, Christina Grant, Bina Hoey, Sharon Hughes, Sharon Milner, Sharon Mullan, Kathleen McCann, Brid McMahon, Theresa McGarry, Paula Nolan, Anne Traynor, Clare Willcocks. Also Joanne Glenn and Ruth McLoughlin of J2A whose help was greatly appreciated. Furthermore, we would like to thank our headmistress, Sister Perpetua, without whose co_operation this project would have been unsuccessful. Also to extend our thanks to the members of staff who helped us: Mrs Campbell, Mrs Gillespie, Mr O'Donnell, Miss McAteer,and Miss Briege King.
